name: Stream Deck Icons and Mockup
description:
A bunch of icons in the right size for use with Stream Deck display-keypads. For now these are just the icons I personally need for Figma (shortcuts that are hard to press with one hand), and also the iRacing driving simulator, but I might be adding other uses too. I'm open for suggestions!


To find all of Figma's icons, check out the official UI2: Figma's Design System – Figma


For an overview of all shortcuts in Viktor Teplov's Figma Keyboard Shortcuts – Figma


More Figma icons ready for Stream Deck can be found at Julio Servan's Figma Stream Deck WIP – Figma


Updated on 31.3.2021:

  • Added some "general" icons (like back arrow, more) and icons for Windows and its File Explorer
